### Basic Introduction {.tabset}

#### Notes

<img src="images/8051_intro.jpg">

8051 chip:

* 8-bit wide
* 128-byte RAM
* 4K ROM
* 2 Timers
* One Serial Port
* Four I/O (8-bit)
* 6 interrupts sources
